data.text: Alatala xa konyi Dawuda xa bɛɛti bɛɛtibae xa mangɛ bɛ
N bara mixi ɲaaxi xa matandi maɲɔxun n bɔɲɛ kui.
A a yɛtɛ igboma han a mu nɔma a xa yunubi tode,
A xa wɔyɛnyi ɲaaxu, a nu mixi madaxu tun.
A fe ɲaaxi maɲɔxunma kɔɛ ra, a fa kira ɲaaxi suxu,
Alatala, i xa hinnɛ koore lima,
I xa tinxinyi gbo alɔ geyae.
E wasama i xa nɛmɛ nan na,
I tan nan gbansan nɔma adama rabalode.
I xa hinnɛ i kolonmae ra,
I xa n natanga yɛtɛ igboee ma,
Tinxintaree birama nɛ, e mu nɔma kelide sɔnɔn.
